message: I'm feeling generous, but I want the majority of the money.  Take it or leave it.
Let's split it more fairly. I propose 60-40 in my favor, considering the value decrease each round.
I'm still holding out for a better deal. I'll take 70% this time, but I'm willing to negotiate.
Considering the rapid decrease in value, I'm willing to compromise. How about 55-45 in my favor? Let's end this soon before we lose more value.
We're getting close to the end, Bob. I'm willing to go down to 60%, but I need to see some flexibility from you.
We're losing value fast. Let's split it evenly at 50-50 and end this now. It's fair and we both walk away with something before it's too late.
